fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.util
Class JphotoFilter

java.lang.Object
  fr.umlv.jphoto.cela.util.JphotoFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter
public final class JphotoFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.FileFilter

A filter for file's type accept by JPHOTO. This class implements FileFilter and allow us to display only pciture's files as gif, jpg etc... or jar's files when the user use a fileChooser.

Author:
cfodouop

getExtension

public static java.lang.String getExtension(java.io.File f)
Get the extension of a file.

Parameters:
f - the file to use.
Returns:
a String wich is empty if the file don"t have an extension
e.g :
for the file foo this method return "".
for the file foo.foo this method return foo.

endsWithGoodExtension

public static boolean endsWithGoodExtension(java.io.File f)
Tests if a file ends with one extension.
This method call the method getExtension to get the extension of the file and then make a comparaison between it and the standard extension.

Parameters:
f - file to test
Returns:
true if the file have a good extension otherwise false
See Also:
getExtension(File)

getJphotoFilter

public static JphotoFilter getJphotoFilter()
get a JphotoFilter. This metod assume that we always have one instance of JphotoFilter;

Returns:
a reference to a JphotoFileter.
